etymology.interpretation: 手作 refers to items that are handmade or crafted by hand, emphasizing the human touch and personal craftsmanship involved in their creation.

parts.english: to make; to do; to work; to produce

examples.chinese: 她的手作蛋糕非常受欢迎(她的手作蛋糕非常受歡迎)。
examples.pinyin: Tā de shǒu zuò dàngāo fēicháng shòu huānyíng.
examples.english: Her handmade cakes are very popular.

examples.chinese: 他展示了许多美丽的手作饰品(他展示了許多美麗的手作飾品)。
examples.pinyin: Tā zhǎnshìle xǔduō měilì de shǒu zuò shìpǐn.
examples.english: He displayed many beautiful handmade accessories.

examples.chinese: 市场上有一个摊位专门卖手作品(市場上有一個攤位專門賣手作品)。
examples.pinyin: Shìchǎng shàng yǒu yī gè tānwèi zhuānmén mài shǒu zuò pǐn.
examples.english: There is a stall in the market that specializes in selling handcrafted items.
